text:
@NYGovCuomo I understand you are to visit Trump in the White House.

I'd advise against it.  No good can possibly come of it.

Knowing him and those around him, there will be some kind of trap.  He is capable of anything - even secretly infecting u with covid19.

Sincerely, Concerned Admirer
